metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0127 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Insufficient control flow management in some Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable a denial of service via local access. It was discovered that some Intel processors may not implement sufficient control flow management. This may allow a local authenticated user to cause a denial of service.

notes.Note: alexmurray> Updates available in upstream release https://github.com/intel/Intel-Linux-Processor-Microcode-Data-Files/releases/tag/microcode-20220207

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'early microcode loading not allowed').
